front.title: RPKI Repository Validation Using Local Cache

abstract.t: This document describes the approach to validate the content of the RPKI repository, which is independent of a particular object retrieval mechanism. This allows it to be used with repositories available over rsync protocol (see Section 3 of[RFC6481]), and delta protocol ( [I-D.tbruijnzeels-sidr-delta-protocol]), as well as repositories that use a mix of both.
